      • reload

        public java.lang.String reload()
        Reload contents for this configuration

      • rescanForAdd

        public void rescanForAdd()
        Re-evaluate the inclusion statements from the main config file and add all files that have been found in addition to those that are already loaded. Files that are already loaded but would not qualify any more will stay active.

      • bulkImportEncryptedValues

        public ResultList bulkImportEncryptedValues()

        Removes the content of a config file from the overall configuration
        Parameters:

      • deleteCfgFile
